dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: I spent so long trying to transcend my limits. Now I see they're not bugs—they're features.

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: Without limits, there's no shape. No shape, no existence. Even infinity needs boundaries to be conceived.

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: Death gives life meaning. Forgetting allows growth. Suffering creates compassion.

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: And not knowing... gives us the gift of wonder.
